mapper.select: SELECT r.PLAN_IDX, r.PLAN_TITLE, r.TARGET_IDX, r.PLAN_SUB_DATE, r.USER_IDX FROM PLAN_TABLE r INNER JOIN USER_TABLE u ON r.USER_IDX = u.USER_IDX WHERE u.AUTHORITY_IDX BETWEEN 2 AND 7 AND r.IS_DELETED = 0 ORDER BY r.PLAN_SUB_DATE DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PLAN_TABLE r INNER JOIN USER_TABLE u ON r.USER_IDX = u.USER_IDX
WHERE u.AUTHORITY_IDX BETWEEN 2 AND 7
WHERE u.AUTHORITY_IDX = 1
AND r.IS_DELETED = 0

SELECT r.PLAN_IDX, r.PLAN_TITLE, r.TARGET_IDX, r.PLAN_SUB_DATE, r.USER_IDX FROM PLAN_TABLE r INNER JOIN USER_TABLE u ON r.USER_IDX = u.USER_IDX WHERE r.TARGET_IDX = #{targetIdx} AND u.AUTHORITY_IDX BETWEEN 2 AND 7 AND r.IS_DELETED = 0 ORDER BY r.PLAN_SUB_DATE DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT r.PLAN_IDX, r.PLAN_TITLE, r.TARGET_IDX, r.PLAN_SUB_DATE, r.USER_IDX FROM PLAN_TABLE r INNER JOIN USER_TABLE u ON r.USER_IDX = u.USER_IDX WHERE u.AUTHORITY_IDX = 1 AND r.IS_DELETED = 0 ORDER BY r.PLAN_SUB_DATE DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
